title: Unisex Hoodie
description: Made to be stylish as well as comfortable, the Independent Trading Co. SS4500 personalized hooded sweatshirt delivers on all fronts. Made from an 80% - 20% cotton/polyester blend, it strikes the perfect balance between cozy and stretchy. What's more, the metal eyelets for your hoodie drawstrings add durability while the jersey-lined hood keeps you nice & warm when it’s needed. .: 80% cotton, 20 % polyester fleece with 100% cotton face (fiber content may vary for different colors).: Medium-heavy fabric (8.5 oz /yd² (280 g/m²)).: Regular fit.: Tear-away label
descriptionHtml:
Made to be stylish as well as comfortable, the Independent Trading Co. SS4500 personalized hooded sweatshirt delivers on all fronts. Made from an 80% - 20% cotton/polyester blend, it strikes the perfect balance between cozy and stretchy. What's more, the metal eyelets for your hoodie drawstrings add durability while the jersey-lined hood keeps you nice & warm when it’s needed.

.: 80% cotton, 20

 % polyester fleece with 100% cotton face (fiber content may vary for different colors)
.: Medium-heavy fabric (8.5 oz /yd² (280 g/m²))
.: Regular fit
.: Tear-away label

title: Reactiv Hoodie
description: Black unisex hoodie in a heavyweight jersey cotton with a slightly oversized fit. Super soft, pre-shrunk and piece dyed for the ultimate jersey. Ribbed hem & cuffs. This black hoodie features our Reactiv logo on the chest, and our signature green drawstrings. - Blacky Hoodie- Oversized fit- Green drawstrings - Loopback Jersey- Ribbed trims- Overhead hoodie 100% Cotton body.450gsm. Made in Portugal
descriptionHtml:
Black unisex hoodie in a heavyweight jersey cotton with a slightly oversized fit. Super soft, pre-shrunk and piece dyed for the ultimate jersey. Ribbed hem & cuffs. This black hoodie features our Reactiv logo on the chest, and our signature green drawstrings.

- Blacky Hoodie
- Oversized fit
- Green drawstrings 
- Loopback Jersey
- Ribbed trims
- Overhead hoodie

100% Cotton body.
450gsm.

Made in Portugal

title: Unisex Heavy Blend™ Full Zip Hooded Sweatshirt - White
description: The classic comfy zip-up, featuring air-jet spun yarn for a softer fleece with reduced pilling. Once put on, it will be impossible to take off. .: 50% cotton, 50% polyester.: Medium-heavy fabric (8 oz/yd² (271 g/m²)).: Classic fit.: Sewn-in label.: Runs true to size
descriptionHtml:
The classic comfy zip-up, featuring air-jet spun yarn for a softer fleece with reduced pilling. Once put on, it will be impossible to take off.

.: 50% cotton, 50% polyester
.: Medium-heavy fabric (8 oz/yd² (271 g/m²))
.: Classic fit
.: Sewn-in label
.: Runs true to size
